entry.title: 统计git提交行数的脚本
entry.content:
可以保存为count.sh运行 ./count.sh your_name ``` #!/bin/sh insert=0 delete=0 git log–author=$1–shortstat–pretty=format:“”|sed/^$/d >.tmp.count

whilereadline ;do
current=`echo$line|awk-F',''{printf $2}'|awk'{printf $1}'`
insert=`expr$insert+ $current`
current=`echo$line|awk-F',''{printf $3}'|awk'{printf $1}'`
delete=`expr$delete+ $current`
done<.tmp.count

rm .tmp.count
echo$1$insertinsertions, $deletedeletions

```
